entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Agassiz
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:58 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Agassiz 7:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -1
Dewpoint: -0.6°C
Wind: SE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 40 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening. Snow mixed with rain beginning late in the evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023
